item.title: Pitch your game idea at the April Meetup
item.description:
Tulsa Game Developers

Come and pitch your game for feedback. Watch others and you give feedback. We'll have room for 6 ten minute pitches.

Tulsa, OK 74103 - USA

Thursday, April 14 at 6:00 PM

6

https://www.meetup.com/Tulsa-Game-Developers/events/284697910/
